original_text: Since we were a young nation, we have seen all our good things disappear. The useless gods that we worshipped have taken them. They took away the things that our ancestors worked to get. They took away our sheep and our cows. They even took away our sons and our daughters. Since we were a young nation,
korean_text: 부끄러운 그것이 우리가 청년의 때로부터 우리 조상들의 산업인 양 떼와 소 떼와 아들들과 딸들을 삼켰사온즉

sentences.original_text: Since we were a young nation
we have seen all our good things disappear
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 우리의 모든 좋은 것들이 사라지는 것을 보아왔습니다

sentences.original_text: The useless gods that we worshipped
that our ancestors worked to get
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 조상들이 얻기 위해 노력했던 것들을

sentences.original_text: They took away our sheep and our cows
They even took away our sons and our daughters
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 심지어 우리의 아들들과 딸들까지 가져갔습니다

sentences.original_text: Since we were a young nation
